title: how to contact riot games
body: ii have an idea to use at the game but i dont know how to email riot games can someone tell me how ???

replies.body: Kokua's suggestion is pretty solid, the concepts boards would be a great place to share your ideas and suggestions with both community and devs!
If you have an idea that you would like to share, feel free to post it in the [Concepts and Creations](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts) section.
